message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, but I'm willing to start negotiations at $110. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me.  I'm interested, but I was hoping to spend closer to $90.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet somewhere in the middle? I'll offer the product at $105. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  To be honest, $95 is the absolute highest I can go.
I'm glad you're willing to work within your budget, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, how about we set the product price at $100? This would be a win-win situation for both of us.
